text:
A Moment of Clarity

A bridge at sunset; a man in turmoil.  
He feels a weight lift.  
Man: “My God! I couldn’t do it!”  

Man: “Why am I still here?”  
He gazes at the Neva, calm.  
Man: “Lord, show me my path.”  

---  

A sense of freedom washes over him.  
He reflects on his burdens.  
Man: “That spell is broken!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist experiences a profound sense of relief and newfound freedom after renouncing his dark desires and reflecting on a seemingly fateful detour.
